comment.brief: Fuse virtual points, typical for a `ScrollView` or other `Element` size property
comment.full: Fuse virtual points, typical for a `ScrollView` or other `Element` size property

comment.brief: Normalized values are those where `1` represents a full unit of movement, such as a page in navigation
comment.full: Normalized values are those where `1` represents a full unit of movement, such as a page in navigation

comment.brief: Measures an angular value in radians. This is a wrapping value.
comment.full: Measures an angular value in radians. This is a wrapping value.

comment.brief: Measures an angular value in degress. This is a wrapping value.
comment.full: Measures an angular value in degress. This is a wrapping value.

comment.brief: The Unit specifies what type of value is being animated.
comment.full: The Unit specifies what type of value is being animated.
